data.name: A. F. Kay
data.heroPowerText: Passive Skip your first two turns. Start with two minions from Tavern Tier 3.

data.name: Al'Akir
data.heroPowerText: Passive Start of Combat: Give your left-most minion Windfury, Divine Shield, and Taunt.

data.name: Alexstrasza
data.heroPowerText: Discover a Dragon. (Unlocks at Tier 4.)

data.name: Ambassador Faelin
data.heroPowerText: Passive. Skip your first turn. Discover a Tier 2, 4, and 6 minion to get at those Tiers.

data.name: Aranna Starseeker
data.heroPowerText: Passive After 14 friendly minions attack, the first minion you buy each turn is free. (16 left!)

data.name: Arch-Villain Rafaam
data.heroPowerText: Next combat, add a plain copy of the first minion you kill to your hand.

data.name: Artanis
data.heroPowerText: Passive. At the start of the game, choose from 2 Protoss minions to get after you buy 14 cards.

data.name: Bru'kan
data.heroPowerText: Choose an Element. Start of Combat: Call upon that Element.
data.notes: Stable Amalgamation and Tumbling Disaster will no longer be offered to Bru'kan.

data.name: Buttons
data.heroPowerText: On Turn 8, choose a Greater Trinket to buy (8 turns left!).

data.name: C'Thun
data.heroPowerText: At end of turn, give a friendly minion +2/+1. Repeat 0 times. (Upgrades each turn!)

data.name: Cap'n Hoggarr
data.heroPowerText: Passive After you buy a Pirate, gain 1 Gold.

data.name: Captain Eudora
data.heroPowerText: Dig for a Golden minion! (4 Digs left.)

data.name: Captain Hooktusk
data.heroPowerText: Remove a minion. Choose one from a Tier lower to get.

data.name: Cariel Roame
data.heroPowerText: Give 3 friendly minions +1/+1. (After you upgrade the Tavern, choose an improvement!)

data.name: Chenvaala
data.heroPowerText: Passive After you play 3 Elementals, reduce the cost of upgrading the Tavern by (3).

data.name: Cho
data.heroPowerText: Passive. Whenever you play a Golden minion, both you and Gall get a Triple Reward. (3 left!)
data.notes: Can only be selected if your partner chooses Gall.

data.name: Cookie the Cook
data.heroPowerText: Throw a minion in your pot. When you've gathered 3, Discover from their minion types. (3 left!)

data.name: Dancin' Deryl
data.heroPowerText: Passive. When you play a minion, give it a +1/+1 hat that passes to a friendly minion when sold.

data.name: Death Speaker Blackthorn
data.heroPowerText: Get 2 Blood Gems. (Twice per turn.)

data.name: Deathwing
data.heroPowerText: Passive ALL minions have +3 Attack.

data.name: Diablo
data.heroPowerText: Passive. Every 4 turns, ALL enemies fight the Lord of Terror and your warband for loot. (4 turns left!)

data.name: Dinotamer Brann
data.heroPowerText: Passive. After you buy 6 Battlecry minions, get a Brann Bronzebeard. (Once per game.)
data.notes: Dinotamer Brann's Hero Power will wait until you have handspace.

data.name: Doctor Holli'dae
data.heroPowerText: Get a random Tavern spell.

data.name: Drek'Thar
data.heroPowerText: Passive Avenge (2): Give your minions +1 Attack permanently.

data.name: E.T.C., Band Manager
data.heroPowerText: Discover a Buddy. (Unlocks at Tier 2.)

data.name: Edwin VanCleef
data.heroPowerText: Give a minion +2/+2. Upgrades after you buy 5 cards. (5 left!)

data.name: Elise Starseeker
data.heroPowerText: Discover a minion from your Tavern tier. Costs (1) more after each use.

data.name: Enhance-o Mechano
data.heroPowerText: Passive. After each Refresh, give a minion in the Tavern Taunt, Reborn, Windfury, or Divine Shield.

data.name: Exarch Othaar
data.heroPowerText: The next Tavern spell you buy costs (1) less. (Unlocks on turn 3.)

data.name: Farseer Nobundo
data.heroPowerText: Get a copy of the last Tavern spell you cast. Each turn, your next Hero Power costs (1) less.

data.name: Flobbidinous Floop
data.heroPowerText: Choose a friendly minion. Start of Combat: Transform it into your teammate's highest-Tier minion.

data.name: Forest Lord Cenarius
data.heroPowerText: Increase your maximum Gold by 1.

data.name: Forest Warden Omu
data.heroPowerText: Passive After you upgrade the Tavern, gain 2 Gold this turn only.
data.notes: Forest Warden Omu is banned from games with the Money Match and the Valuation Inflation Anomaly.

data.name: Fungalmancer Flurgl
data.heroPowerText: Passive. After you sell 5 minions, get a random Murloc. (5 left.)

data.name: Galakrond
data.heroPowerText: Choose a minion in the Tavern. Then choose a higher Tier minion to replace it.

data.name: Galewing
data.heroPowerText: Choose a new flightpath. Complete it to get a bonus!

data.name: Gall
data.heroPowerText: Passive. Whenever you play a Golden minion, both you and Cho get a Triple Reward. (3 left!)
data.notes: Can only be selected if your partner chooses Cho.

data.name: George the Fallen
data.heroPowerText: Give a minion Divine Shield.

data.name: Greybough
data.heroPowerText: Passive Give +1/+2 and Taunt to minions you summon during combat.
data.notes: Banned in Mech games.

data.name: Guff Runetotem
data.heroPowerText: Passive. After you buy 20 Tiers' worth of cards, get a Triple Reward. (205 left!)
data.notes: The hero power can be triggered multiple times in a game.

data.name: Heistbaron Togwaggle
data.heroPowerText: Steal all minions in the Tavern. Each turn, your next Hero Power costs (1) less.

data.name: Illidan Stormrage
data.heroPowerText: Passive. Start of Combat: Your left and right-most minions gain +2/+1 and attack immediately.
data.notes: Illidan Stormrage is banned from Dragons games across all Battlegrounds

data.name: Infinite Toki
data.heroPowerText: Refresh the Tavern. Include two minions from a higher Tavern Tier.

data.name: Inge, the Iron Hymn
data.heroPowerText: Give a minion Attack equal to your Tavern Tier. (Swaps to Health next turn!)

data.name: Ini Stormcoil
data.heroPowerText: Passive: After 9 friendly minions die, get a random Mech.

data.name: Jandice Barov
data.heroPowerText: Swap a friendly non-golden minion with a random one in the Tavern.
data.notes:
Jandice Barov will not be offered in games with Elementals.

Double-Headed Reward has been banned from Jandice Barov.

data.name: Jim Raynor
data.heroPowerText: Passive. Start with a 2/2 Battlecruiser that adds an Upgrade to the Tavern whenever it is Refreshed.
data.notes: The Upgrades are a special pool of spells that upgrade your Battlecruiser with additional stats and effects. They have a range of Tavern Tiers and Costs, and can be bought from the Tavern, but they don’t count as Tavern Spells. You can get each Upgrade as many times as you want, except for four that you can only get once: Advanced Construction, Fortified Bunker, Missile Pod, Ultra-Capacitor.

data.name: Kael'thas Sunstrider
data.heroPowerText: Passive. Every third minion you play gets +1/+1 and improves this by +1/+1.

data.name: Kerrigan, Queen of Blades
data.heroPowerText: Unlock Tier 2 Zerg. Costs (1) less each turn. Passive: Start the game with a 2/2 Larva.

data.name: King Mukla
data.heroPowerText: Passive At the start of your turn, get 2 Bananas and give everyone else one.

data.name: Kurtrus Ashfallen
data.heroPowerText: Passive. Once per turn, after you buy 3 minions, get a plain copy of one of them. (3 left!)
data.notes: Kurtrus Ashfallen is banned from games with the Money Match Anomaly.

data.name: Lady Vashj
data.heroPowerText: Discover a Spellcraft spell of your Tier or lower. Passive: Your first one each turn is permanent.

data.name: Lich Baz'hial
data.heroPowerText: Steal a card from the Tavern. Take 2 damage.

data.name: Lord Barov
data.heroPowerText: Guess which player will win their next combat. If they win, get 3 Coins.

data.name: Lord Jaraxxus
data.heroPowerText: Choose a friendly Demon. It consumes a minion in the Tavern to gain its stats.

data.name: Madam Goya
data.heroPowerText: Pass a non-Golden minion.

data.name: Maiev Shadowsong
data.heroPowerText: Choose a card in the Tavern to lock in your hand. After 2 turns, unlock it.

data.name: Malygos
data.heroPowerText: Replace a card with a random one of the same Tavern Tier. (Twice per turn.)

data.name: Marin the Manager
data.heroPowerText: Passive. On Turn 5, choose a Lesser Trinket to buy. (4 turns left!)
data.notes: Kaboom Bot Portrait, Eternal Portrait, Felblood Portrait, Tiger Carving, Souvenir Stand, Goose Portrait, and Empowered Mirror have been removed from the Hero Power Trinket Pool.

data.name: Master Nguyen
data.heroPowerText: Passive At the start of every turn, choose from 2 new Hero Powers.

data.name: Millhouse Manastorm
data.heroPowerText: Passive Minions cost 2 Gold. Refresh costs 2 Gold. Tavern Tiers cost (1) more.

data.name: Millificent Manastorm
data.heroPowerText: Passive Whenever you summon a Mech, give it +3 Attack.

data.name: Mr. Bigglesworth
data.heroPowerText: Passive When a player dies, Discover a minion from their warband. It keeps any enchantments.
data.notes: Mr. Bigglesworth is  banned in Duos.

data.name: Murloc Holmes
data.heroPowerText: Look at 2 minions. Guess which one your next opponent had last combat for a Coin.
data.notes: Murloc Holmes is not part of the Hero Pool for Battlegrounds Duos.

data.name: Mutanus the Devourer
data.heroPowerText: Remove a friendly minion. Spit its stats onto another. Get 1 Gold.

data.name: N'Zoth
data.heroPowerText: Passive Start the game with a 2/2 Fish that gains all your Deathrattles in combat.

data.name: Nozdormu
data.heroPowerText: Passive Your first Refresh each turn costs (0).

data.name: Onyxia
data.heroPowerText: Passive Avenge (4): Summon a 3/1 Whelp. It attacks immediately.
data.notes: Stable Amalgamation and Tumbling Disaster will no longer be offered to Onyxia.

data.name: Overlord Saurfang
data.heroPowerText: Give a minion in the Tavern +2/+2. (Doubles every 3 turns!)

data.name: Ozumat
data.heroPowerText: Passive. When you have space in combat, summon a 2/2 Tentacle with Taunt. (Gains +1/+1 after you sell a minion!)

data.name: Patches the Pirate
data.heroPowerText: Get a Pirate. After you buy a Pirate, your next Hero Power costs (1) less.

data.name: Patchwerk
data.heroPowerText: Passive Start with 60 Health instead of 30.

data.name: Professor Putricide
data.heroPowerText: Craft a custom Undead. (3 Creations left!)

data.name: Pyramad
data.heroPowerText: Give a minion +2 Health. (Gains +1 Health each turn you don't use this!)

data.name: Queen Azshara
data.heroPowerText: Passive. When your warband reaches 30 total Attack, begin your Naga Conquest.

data.name: Queen Wagtoggle
data.heroPowerText: Passive. Start of Combat: Give a friendly minion of each type stats equal to their Tavern Tiers.

data.name: Ragnaros the Firelord
data.heroPowerText: Passive After you kill 16 enemy minions, get Sulfuras. (16 left!)

data.name: Rakanishu
data.heroPowerText: Get a 'Lantern Light' that gives a minion stats equal to your Tier.

data.name: Reno Jackson
data.heroPowerText: Make a friendly minion Golden. (Once per game.)

data.name: Rock Master Voone
data.heroPowerText: Passive. At the end of every 3 turns, get a plain copy of the left-most card in your hand. (3 turns left!)

data.name: Rokara
data.heroPowerText: Passive. After a friendly minion kills an enemy, give it +1 Attack permanently.

data.name: Scabbs Cutterbutter
data.heroPowerText: Discover a plain copy of a minion from your next opponent's warband.

data.name: Shudderwock
data.heroPowerText: Trigger a friendly minion's Battlecry. (Unlocks on Turn 3.)
data.notes: Banned in Beast lobbies.

data.name: Silas Darkmoon
data.heroPowerText: Passive. Darkmoon Tickets are in the Tavern! Get 3 to Discover a minion from your Tavern Tier.

data.name: Sindragosa
data.heroPowerText: Freeze a card in the Tavern. Passive: At the end of your turn, Frozen minions get +2/+2.

data.name: Sir Finley Mrrgglton
data.heroPowerText: Passive At the start of the game, Discover a Hero Power.
data.notes: Sir Finley has been temporarily removed from the Hero Pool in Duos due to a bug.

data.name: Sire Denathrius
data.heroPowerText: Passive. At the start of the game, choose one of two Quests.
data.notes: Another Hidden Body has been temporarily removed from the Quest Pool in Duos, due to a bug.

data.name: Skycap'n Kragg
data.heroPowerText: Gain 1 Gold this turn. Increases each turn. (Once per game.)

data.name: Snake Eyes
data.heroPowerText: Roll a 6-sided die. Gain that much Gold. (Cannot be used again for that many turns!)

data.name: Sneed
data.heroPowerText: Give a minion: "Deathrattle: Summon a random minion from the same Tavern Tier lower."
data.notes: Sneed is unavailable in games with Undead.

data.name: Sylvanas Windrunner
data.heroPowerText: Give +3/+1 to your minions that died last combat.

data.name: Tae'thelan Bloodwatcher
data.heroPowerText: Passive Every fourth Tavern Spell you buy costs (0).

data.name: Tamsin Roame
data.heroPowerText: Start of Combat: Destroy your lowest Health minion. Give its stats to your other minions.

data.name: Tavish Stormpike
data.heroPowerText: Take aim! Start of Combat: Deal 3 damage to your target. (Doubles every 3 turns!)

data.name: Teron Gorefiend
data.heroPowerText: Choose a friendly minion. Start of Combat: Destroy it. Once you have space, resummon an exact copy.

data.name: Tess Greymane
data.heroPowerText: Refresh the Tavern with your last opponent's warband.

data.name: The Curator
data.heroPowerText: Passive Start the game with a 2/2 Amalgam with Venomous and all minion types.
data.notes: The Curator is banned in Demon lobbies.

data.name: The Great Akazamzarak
data.heroPowerText: Choose a Secret. Put it into the battlefield.

data.name: The Jailer
data.heroPowerText: Give a minion +1/+1. Upgrades after five friendly minions die. (5 left!)

data.name: The Lich King
data.heroPowerText: Give a friendly minion Reborn for the next combat only.

data.name: The Nameless One
data.heroPowerText: Passive. Start of Game: Copy your teammate's Hero Power.

data.name: The Rat King
data.heroPowerText: Discover a minion of a specific type. Swaps type each turn.

data.name: Thorim, Stormlord
data.heroPowerText: Passive. At the start of the game, Discover a Tier 7 minion to get after you spend 65 Gold. (65 left!)
data.notes: Argent Braggart has been removed from the Discoverable options. Additionally, Papa Bear now summons three 4/4 Mama Bears that give +4/+4 (Mama Bear herself is not in the minion pool).

data.name: Tickatus
data.heroPowerText: Passive Every 4 turns, Discover a Darkmoon Prize. (3 turns left!)

data.name: Trade Prince Gallywix
data.heroPowerText: Passive After you sell a minion, get 1 extra Gold next turn. (Can exceed 10.)
data.notes: Is banned from Elementals lobbies.

data.name: Vanndar Stormpike
data.heroPowerText: Passive Avenge (2): Give your minions +1 Health permanently.

data.name: Varden Dawngrasp
data.heroPowerText: Passive. After the Tavern is Refreshed, copy his highest Tier minion and Freeze them both.

data.name: Vol'jin
data.heroPowerText: Choose 2 minions. They gain each other's Attack until next turn.

data.name: Xyrella
data.heroPowerText: Choose a minion in the Tavern to add to your hand. Set its stats to 2.

data.name: Y'Shaarj
data.heroPowerText: Start of Combat: Summon and get a random minion from your Tavern Tier.

data.name: Yogg-Saron, Hope's End
data.heroPowerText: Add a random minion in the Tavern to your hand. Give it +1/+1.

data.name: Ysera
data.heroPowerText: Passive The Tavern always offers an extra Dragon whenever it is Refreshed.

data.name: Zephrys, the Great
data.heroPowerText: If you have two copies of a minion, find the third. (3 Wishes left!)

data.name: Zerek, Master Cloner
data.heroPowerText: Summon an exact copy of a friendly minion. (Once per game.)
